name: Frontier
description: Frontier is a TV series starring Jason Momoa, Landon Liboiron, and Zoe Boyle. Follows Declan Harp, a half-Irish/half Cree Native-Canadian outlaw who is campaigning to breach the Hudson's Bay Company's monopoly on the fur trade in...

review.name: A new fan!
review.reviewBody: I was not a Momoa's fan by any means... But I found this series in netflix and I gave it a chance... I was very impressed but with his acting... He's great in it.... His voice, tone, physical language is on point... The only think I'm disappointed is the actress that play "Grace"... She has cero chemistry with Jason and their scenes are dull and boring because of that.They should've choose someone with chemistry with Jason.

trailer.name: Season 3 Official Trailer
trailer.description: While Harp pursues Lord Benton to rescue Grace, Michael takes command of the Black Wolf Company and Sokanon embarks on a righteous crusade.

Title: Frontier
